  • Constructor Details

    • Nymph

      public Nymph​(processing.core.PImage img, double x, double y)
      Initilize the nymph other values are setted as a default that shown in Creature.java constructors and visitor.java constructor
      Parameters:
      img - the visitor image
      x - x coordinate of the visitor
      y - y coordinate of the visitor

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw​(DrawingSurface g)
      The nymph will be drawn by Creature.java draw method It will try to set nymph's house if nymph does not have a house It will draw "huh?" or "huh!" on top of its head when it feels bad
      Overrides:
      draw in class Creature
      Parameters:
      g - Drawing surface object that the creature will be drawn on
      Precondition:
      Drawing Surface has to be not the null

    • act

      public void act()
      If the nymph wants to go out the island, she goes toward the deck to leave the island If nymph has a house, and the times is later than 16, she would go to home. If nymph does not fed for a day, she would be depressed a little bit more If nymph does not have a house after 16, she would be angry and wanting to go out the island. If the checkCirceNearby() returns not a null, it will chase the circe
      Overrides:
      act in class Visitor
      Precondition:
      island has to be not null

    • getEmotion

      public int getEmotion()
      Returns:
      the integer that represents nymph's feeling

    • setEmotion

      public void setEmotion​(int i)
      Set the nymph's emotion with the parameter
      Parameters:
      i - integer that represents Nymph's new emotion state

    • getHouseLoc

      public int[] getHouseLoc()
      Returns:
      the grid coordinate if nymph has a house, null if nymph does not have a house

    • setGetOut

      public void setGetOut​(boolean b)
      Set wheter nymph wants to go out or not by boolean b true represents nymph wants to go out, and false represents nymph does not want to go out the island
      Parameters:
      b - new nymph wanting go out state

    • getGetOut

      public boolean getGetOut()
      Returns:
      true if nymph wants to get out of the island, false otherwise

    • getType

      public java.lang.String getType()
      Overrides:
      getType in class Visitor
      Returns:
      the type of this class ("Nymph")

    • fed

      public void fed()
      updating the emotion state.
